transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Haanji Sharma ji aap bol rahe ho Indiamart head office se aapne abhi call kiya tha na aapko kuch information chahiye thi video meeting ke regarding.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Main aapko meeting ka link share kar du aapke system pe.
Customer: Whatsapp pe.
Executive: Ji ji dekhiye maine ek second whatsapp kar do main aapko ek second.
Customer: Aapki waise bhi wali mail id pe gaya hoga.
Executive: Srichakrapani.eng@gmail.com.
Customer: Thik hai main aapko na whatsapp kar deti hu aap ek second on call aap ek second sir main aapke whatsapp kar deti hu.
Customer: Haanji boliye.
Executive: Haan haan sir ek second main aapko message kar rahi hu aap dekho aapko ye aapke isi 764 wale number pe karna hai na.
Customer: Haan dekhiye maine aapko whatsapp pe hi kiya hua hai aur abhi main aapko wo bhi share kar rahi hu meeting ka link.
Customer: Hamare account me se paise wagera.
Executive: Haan dekhiye maine aapko meeting ka link bhi share kar diya hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needed information regarding video meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the meeting link on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- meeting link, whatsapp, video meeting
